title._content: Image taken from page 163 of 'Mountaineering in Colorado. The peaks about Estes Park. By Frederick H. Chapin. [With plates.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Mountaineering in Colorado. The peaks about Estes Park. By Frederick H. Chapin. [With plates.]" Contributor: CHAPIN, Frederick Hastings. Author: Appalachian Mountain Club (BOSTON, Massachusetts) Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10413.f.4." Page: 163 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1889 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000424148 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
